content: 6 6 sts with 4mm needle begin with a knit row and knit 14 14 18 18 20 20 22 22 24 row in st st now increases are worked to shape the neckline row 1 rs k to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 2 ws purl to the end row 3 rs knit to the end row 4 ws purl to the end row 5 rs k to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 6 ws purl to the end repeat these 6 row a total of 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 7 7 times sizes xxs l 2xl 4xl repeat row 1-2 once more there have been 9 10 10 10 11 12 13 14 15 sts increased you now have 13 14 14 14 15 17 18 20 21 sts on the needle do not cut the yarn we continue working from here directly join front pieces knit across the right front piece then cast on 13 15 17 18 21 22 26 28 34 sts using the backwards loop cast-on method knit across the left front piece you now have 39 43 45 46 51 56 62 68 76 sts on the needle purl one row now work increases for the armholes row 1 rs k2 m1l knit to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 2 ws purl to the end repeat 10 10 10 12 12 13 14 15 15 times in total 20 20 20 24 24 26 28 30 30 sts increased there are now 59 63 65 70 75 82 90 98 106 sts on the needle place stitches on hold and cut the yarn 4 ©pinkforme right back with 4mm needle pick up 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 sts at the cast-on edge of the right front piece when you lay the front piece with the right side facing you and the straps up this is the strap on the left side purl one row now work increases to shape the neckline row 1 rs k2 m1l knit to the end row 2 ws purl to the end row 3 rs knit to the end row 4 ws purl to the end row 5 rs k2 m1l knit to the end row 6 ws purl to the end repeat row 1 to 6 a total of 3 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 times there are now 10 12 12 12 14 15 17 18 20 sts on the needle place sts on hold and cut the yarn left back with 4mm needle cast on 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 sts at the cast-on edge of the left front piece when you lay the front piece with the right side facing you and the straps up this is the strap on the right side watch video tutorial purl one row now work increases to shape the neckline row 1 rs k to last 2 sts m1r k2 row
